name: listWebinarParticipants
description:
Use this API to list all the participants who attended a webinar hosted in the past.
**Prerequisites:** * Pro or higher plan with a Webinar Add-on.
**Scopes:** `webinar:read:admin` `webinar:read`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

webinarId.description: Unique identifier of the webinar. You can retrieve the value of this field by calling the [list webinars](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/webinars/webinars) API.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

$ul: **next_page_token**: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.
**page_count**: The number of pages returned for this request.
**page_size**: The total number of records returned from a single API call. (default: 30)
**total_records**: The total number of records available across all pages.
